story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2010, Delbi Restaurant has been serving exceptional cuisine to our valued guests for over a decade. Our journey began with a simple vision: to create a dining experience that combines traditional flavors with modern culinary techniques. Today, we continue to honor this vision while constantly innovating and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the kitchen.
